thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Gare de Lyon Ledru Rollin 12eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect! clean, good location
thread.title_full: Perfect! clean, good location - Review of Ibis Paris Gare de Lyon Ledru Rollin 12eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Corina M
title: Perfect! clean, good location
text:
We stayed for 2 nights, with a baby, and everything was great. The triple room was big enough, clean, everything looked new and modern. Bathroom with decent size, clean, with shower (not a bathtub). They provided a good cot for baby.
Breakfast was ok, but No veggies. There were baguettes, bread, jam, boiled eggs, bananas and oranges, two types of cheese and some ham, yogurt, Cereals, milk and coffee; mini pancakes and muffins.
The location is perfect, within walking distance from Notre Dame Cathedral and The Seine or Pere Lachaise cemetery.
A Careefour Supermarket is just around the corner.
Good value for money. I recommend it!
